message: Let's be fair, Bob. You know you'll get a worse deal if we wait.
Let's be realistic, Alice. This round I get the better share.
Don't be greedy, Bob. This is your chance to get a decent share before inflation eats away at your profit.
The clock is ticking, Alice.  I'm being more than fair, but I won't wait forever.
This is getting ridiculous, Bob. I'm offering you a reasonable deal, take it before it's too late!
Alice, I'm compromising. Time is running out, let's make a deal.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  Meet me in the middle or we both lose!
